Package ohos.data.search.schema

Class NotepadItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.search.model.IndexData
      • ohos.data.search.schema.Schema<NotepadItem>
        • ohos.data.search.schema.NotepadItem

  • public final class NotepadItem
extends Schema<NotepadItem>
    Represents the index schema for notepad items.

    This schema is used to create indexes for notepad items. It supports index fields notepadCategory, content, attachment, and all the fields in CommonItem. Among these fields, identifier is mandatory and can be set via the CommonItem#setIdentifier(String) method.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH

        public NotepadItem setNotepadCategory​(String notepadCategory)
        Sets the notepadCategory index field.

        Attributes of this index field: IndexForm.indexFieldName = "notepadCategory"; IndexForm.indexType = IndexType.SORTED; IndexForm.isPrimaryKey = false; IndexForm.isStore = true; IndexForm.isSearch = true;

        Parameters:
        notepadCategory - Indicates the type of the notepad item.

        Returns this NotepadItem object.
